name: Tooples - Poker Dice
description:
Tooples is the poker dice game for the iPhone and the iPod Touch. Tooples features multiplayer games, computer player, real dice sound, online leaderboard, shake mode, etc

Who don't know the classic poker dice game? Tooples brings the good old dice fun to the iPhone with all necassary features. Beside the well designed interface, the multiplayer mode, the computer player, the real dice sound, you can edit the player name and you can select a player avatar. Your highscores will be saved in an internet based leaderboard.

Features of Tooples:

- Single player mode
- Computer player
- Animated dice (2D)
- Roll the dice by shaking your iPhone/iPod Touch
- Real dice sound - Editable playername
- Selectable avatar (player image)
- Online leaderboard using Game Center
- Automatic save of current game and all options (in the case of an interruption, eg. incoming call)
- Available in the following languages: English & German
